column4: hi there. Do you know wich package i've to install to support mp3 in rhythmbox ?, i tried with a couple and it didn't work. I'm using dapper.
you might want to google for "easyubuntu"
i already did it... and it seems it didn't work neither
it gave me trouble when I tried to do too many things at once; you want to get it to update your repositories and install the mp3 stuff...
